verses.verse: לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֭רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מִזְמ֣וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִׁ֑יר <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song יְ֝סוּדָת֗וֹ <S%H3248><s%> His foundation בְּהַרְרֵי־ <S%H2042><s%> mountains קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> [is] in the holy

אֹהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> loveth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD שַׁעֲרֵ֣י <S%H8179><s%> the gates צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <S%H4908><s%> more than all the dwellings יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob
נִ֭כְבָּדוֹת <S%H3513><s%> Glorious things מְדֻבָּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> are spoken בָּ֑ךְ עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> of thee O city הָאֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> of God סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אַזְכִּ֤יר ׀ <S%H2142><s%> I will make mention רַ֥הַב <S%H7294><s%> of Rahab וּבָבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> and Babylon לְֽיֹ֫דְעָ֥י <S%H3045><s%> to them that know הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold פְלֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H6429><s%> me behold Philistia וְצ֣וֹר <S%H6865><s%> and Tyre עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כּ֑וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> with Ethiopia זֶ֝֗ה <S%H2088><s%> This יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> this [man] was born שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> But

וּֽלֲצִיּ֨וֹן ׀ <S%H6726><s%> And of Zion יֵאָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> it shall be said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> This and that man וְ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> one יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> was born בָּ֑הּ וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself יְכוֹנְנֶ֣הָ <S%H3559><s%> himself shall establish עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> in her and the highest

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יִ֭סְפֹּר <S%H5608><s%> shall count בִּכְת֣וֹב <S%H3789><s%> when he writeth up עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the people זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This יֻלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> [that] this [man] was born שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> there Selah
וְשָׁרִ֥ים <S%H7891><s%> As well the singers כְּחֹלְלִ֑ים <S%H2490><s%> as the players כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מַעְיָנַ֥י <S%H4599><s%> on instruments [shall be there] all my springs בָּֽךְ׃
